quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Mission Organic Value Chain Development for North Eastern Region (MOVCDNER)?1. One of the objective is to empower consumers with program ownership by organizing them into Farmer Interest Groups (FIGs) with final aim to federate into farmer producer organizations (FPOs)/ companies.2. Development of organic parks/zones for specific commodities to be done under the scheme.3. State specific lead agency (Organic Commodity Board or Organic Mission) to coordinate, monitor, support and finance development and operationalization of entire value chain will be created.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2 and 3
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 1 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Mission Organic Value Chain Development for North Eastern Region (MOVCDNER)?1. It targets to create at least 100 to 200 replicable end-to-end organic value chain models in each of state.2. Marketing infrastructure shall be within radius of 25 Km from clusters developed and registered under MOVCDNER.3.Farmers provided subsidy of ₹52500/ ha/ 3 years for on-farm organic inputs including organic fertilizers as well as for procurement of off-farm organic inputs.
options: (A) Only 1 and 2
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 2 and 3
(D) Only 1 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF)?1. It will promote alternative system of farming for freedom from external purchased inputs, cost reduction and thereby increasing income of farmers.2. Standards, certification procedure and branding for Natural Farming products for national and international markets to be created.3. National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF) up-scaled as Bhartiya Prakratik Krishi Paddhati (BPKP) for implementation all across the country.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 1 and 3
(D) Only 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to target under National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF)?1. It targets to cover 7.5 lakh ha area by developing 10,000 clusters in next 4 years.2.  Touch 1 crore farmers along the Ganga belt and in other rainfed parts of country.3.  A financial assistance of Rs. 30000/- per ha @ Rs. 10000/- per ha/year for 3 years will be provided to the farmers as DBT as assistance for creation of on-farm input production infrastructure
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2 and 3
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 1 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Natural Farming cluster under National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF)?1. If farmers are offering less than 1 ha then more number of farmers cannot be included.2. 1 cluster can be in 1 village or in nearby 2-3 villages belonging to the same Gram Panchayat.3. At the discretion of the state 10-20 clusters in nearby area can be federated into a FPO (from 2nd or 3rd year onwards).
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 1 and 2
(C) Only 1 and 3
(D) Only 2 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:
Which statement(s) among the following is/are correct in reference to Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Rural (PMAY-R)?

1. Minimum size of house (including a dedicated area for hygienic cooking) is 25 sq. mt.

2. There is provision of assistance for toilets construction - Rs. 12000 though convergence with Swachh Bharat Mission-Gramin, MGNREGS etc.

3. A compendium of region-specific house designs with the name ‘Awas Vaani’ which includes house designs from various housing zones in various States has been published by the Ministry.

4. Beneficiaries are provided financial Assistance Rs. 1.20 lakh in hilly States (including North Eastern States and UTs of Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh), difficult areas and Integrated Action Plan (IAP) districts.
options: (A) Only 1 and 2
(B) Only 1 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 4
(D) Only 3 and 4
(E) Only 1 and 4

quiz.text:
Which statement(s) among the following is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?
1. The scheme was launched in 2015.
2. Beneficiaries identified using information from Socio Economic and Caste Census (SECC) subject to 15 point exclusion criteria which is to be verified by the Gram Sabhas.
3. Earlier timeline was till 2022 which has now been extended to March, 2025.
4. Convergence for piped drinking water, electricity connection, LPG gas connection etc. different Government programmes are also to be attempted.
options: (A) Only 1 and 2
(B) Only 2 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 3
(D) Only 3 and 4
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:

quiz.text:

1. It targets to create skilled and certified workforce, who not only contribute towards growth of India but also drive country into becoming global skills capital.

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?1. It facilitates collateral free working capital loan up to ₹ 10,000, of 1 year tenure, with enhanced loan of ₹ 20,000 and ₹ 50,000 in 2nd and 3rd trances respectively, on repayment of earlier loans.2. It rewards digital transactions, by way of cash back up to maximum of ₹ 50 in a month .3. On timely/early repayment of the loan, an interest subsidy of 7% per annum will be credited to the bank accounts of beneficiaries through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) on monthly basis.

quiz.text: Which of the following is incorrect with respect to eligibility criteria of beneficiaries under above scheme?
options: (A) Street vendors in possession of Certificate of Vending / Identity Card issued by Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) are eligible.
(B) Vendors, who have been identified in survey but have not been issued Certificate of Vending / Identity Card can not avail benefit under the scheme.

(C) Street Vendors, left out of ULB led identification survey or who have started vending after completion of survey and have been issued Letter of Recommendation (LoR) to that effect by the Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) / Town Vending Committee (TVC) are eligible.

(D) Vendors of surrounding development/ peri-urban / rural areas vending in geographical limits of ULBs and have been issued Letter of Recommendation (LoR) to that effect by the Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) / Town Vending Committee (TVC) are eligible.
(E) All of the above are correct
